channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wall Street's Trash Contains Buried Treasure
item.description: Investors buying index-fund castoffs could have made 74 times their money since 1991.

item.title: Home Depot expects sales to weaken as consumers grow more cautious
item.description: Home Depot's CFO said homeowners are now deferring projects due to a "sense of greater uncertainty in the economy."

item.title: Market Volatility Is Back. Will It Last?
item.description: Investors are buckling up for more turbulence after last week’s global drama interrupted an unusually calm period.

item.title: HelloFresh shares pop 11% as meal kit giant beats profit estimates
item.description: HelloFresh said it got a boost from healthy growth in its ready-to-eat meal delivery business.

item.title: Tim Walz Isn't Very Rich. Americans Disagree on Whether That's a Good Thing.
item.description: The candidate’s finances spur debate on what we value in leaders and how we measure success.

item.title: Deutsche Bank says Eli Lilly stock is a buy — in line with our rating on shares
item.description: The Investing Club holds its "Morning Meeting" every weekday at 10:20 a.m. ET.

item.title: 5 Big Takeaways From This Earnings Season
item.description: Quarterly earnings are on pace to leap ahead for companies in the S&P 500, while revenue underperforms—a scenario that suggests cost-cutting, and not performance, are the driver of recent profits.

item.title: Restaurant CEOs’ new favorite word is value as they aim to bring back customers
item.description: Restaurant CEOs can't stop using the word "value" in explaining lackluster quarterly sales to investors while detailing plans to appeal to thrifty customers.

item.title: S&P 500 Holds Steady Ahead of Fresh Economic Data
item.description: The Nasdaq has advanced in four of the past five trading days.

item.title: E.l.f. Beauty sales jump 50% on gains in color cosmetics and skin care, launch of Bronzing Drops serum
item.description: E.l.f. Beauty has won over younger consumers with its viral marketing and low-priced "dupes" of prestige favorites.
